contents.name: README
contents.contents:
Hello and welcome. Thank you for viewing my website on your mobile device. Unfortunately, your mobile device does not run JavaScript so the functionality of this website is limited. However you can still click links, but you are unable to enter commands.
Contact me at sd [at] sunjaydhama [dot] com.
